col.name: study_accession
description: Study accession on platform where obtained

description: Subject accession on platform where obtained

col.name: sample_accession
description: Sample accession on platform where obtained

description: Pediatric Crohn’s Disease Activity Index (<= 19yrs old)

description: Additional information on time points (importantly, unit)
